import PropTypes from "prop-types"; import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { userAction } from "../../action"; import axios from "axios"; import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' // components const delete_item = async (id) => { let callAPI = "http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/movie/" + id.toString() console.log(callAPI) try { const data = await axios.delete( callAPI ); } catch (e) { console.log(e) } } export default function CardTable(props) { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const { color, column, data } = props; return ( <>

); } CardTable.defaultProps = { color: "light", column: [], data: [] }; CardTable.propTypes = { color: PropTypes.oneOf(["light", "dark"]), column: PropTypes.array, data: PropTypes.array };
